p.s:
( 덕소 ) is a town in
Gyeonggi
province , near
Seoul
in
South Korea
.
Deokso is a small town east of Guri in the Gyeonggi province of South Korea .
It is 12 miles east of Seoul .
Deosko was for a long time detached from Seoul , which is visible in the traditional areas of the town .
Since the opening of a subway station , the town has experienced an increase in modern housing developments and general population .

Deokso is on the Jungnang line of
Seoul Subway System
.
The station is around 45 minutes from Yongsan station and 10 minutes from Guri .
There are lots of buses from all over the province to Deokso which run regularly .

There is a direct bus from
Incheon Airport
which runs 6 times a day .
Deosko is accessible from nearby Maseok and Guri in under 20 minutes .
It is possible to walk from Guri to Deokso .
If you walk towards the Han river and turn left away from Seoul , it s a soothing 2 hour walk to Deokso down the river .
Due to Deokso 's size , the majority of the town can be seen on foot , although buses and taxis are both inexpensive and frequent .

item.s: The Boeing 747-121 , registration N747PA .
This was the first 747 ' Jumbo Jet ' ever to be commercially flown but was decommisioned after crashing in 1971 .
It had logged 2,900 hours of operation at the time of the accident .

The remarkable plane has been
converted into a restaurant
and can be visited on foot , only a twenty minute walk from the station .
, Next to the Train Station . ( Take a right out of the main entrance of the train station . ) .
If you want cheap pizza , welcoming service , and above average cardboard then Pizza School is the place for you .
Do n't let the vaguely education themed garish decor put you off , this is a real gem .
The woman who runs the place is very welcoming and has just started to learn English for her expanding foreign customer base .
The man who makes the pizza does n't talk much though .
However what is important to understand is that meat pizza is only ₩5,000 .
All you have to do is say combination pizza and the woman will always say one .
It is advised you say yes .
Then there will be the phrase " 10 minute " , which will get cuter with every time you order .
Cheap .
, New Deokso ( The other side of the train station ) .
Galbi is a delicious treat enjoyed by many in Korea .
This restaurant is the prime supplier of tasty galbi to hungry Deoksonians .
If you exit the train station on the side no one else does and pass GS25 and turn left you are on the correct road .
To recognise this restaurant look for a large eatery with lots of tables with grills in the middle .
Then , once inside if you want meat on your grill then order galbi sal .
Galbi is best enjoyed in large groups as this reduces the cost of the meal .
This is the most cost effective and taste effective restaurant for Galbi in Deokso .

p.s: Deokso has a fairly modest selection of bars and no night clubs .
Drinks will be less expensive than Seoul and draft beer is available in several Hofs and the following establishments .

item.s: Friendly staff and a US theme in this late-opening bar .
German bar and restaurant on the top floor of the building next to the Subway station .
The tables have built in refridgerators to keep your 3 pint tall glass cold and fresh .
Deokso 's second German themed bar has a good selection of sausages and dark beers .
Close to the airplane , a taxi from the station should cost no more than ₩3,000 .
Simple bar with good service and plenty of room to sit outdoors during the summer .
